attributes.action: stop the closure of our local post office in cogan penarth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are very concerned at the proposed closure of our local Post office in Pill Street Cogan Penarth.This Post Office is very well used by the young and old of Cogan and Llandough, as it is the only Post Office in the district. The people of Cogan and Llandough use this Post Office to draw their Pension , family allowance and  pay their bills. Closure of this local branch will cause considerable difficulties as for some elderly people a trip to the post office is the only time they see friends and neighbours.
